languages.text: {n}Через какое-то время пятно сползается в щелкающую пальцами хохочущую Идиру.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, слышите меня? Эдак вас накрыло! Не волнуйтесь, скоро попустит. Вы как, живы?"

{n}After a while, the blob rearranges itself into the shape of Idira. She is snapping her fingers in front of your face and howling with laughter.{/n} "Lord Captain! Lord Captain, can you hear me? That was some ride, huh? You just take it easy, it'll pass soon. How are you feeling? Still among the living?"
languages.original_text: {n}Через какое-то время пятно сползается в щелкающую пальцами хохочущую Идиру.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, слышите меня? Эдак вас накрыло! Не волнуйтесь, скоро попустит. Вы как, живы?"

traits.locale_text: {n}After a time, the blob condenses into Idira, who is snapping her fingers in front of your face, howling with laughter.{/n} "Lord Captain, can you hear me? That was some ride, huh? You just take it easy, it'll pass soon. How are you feeling? Still among the living?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

Lord Captain, can you hear me? That was some ride, huh? You just take it easy, it'll pass soon. How are you feeling? Still among the living?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Au bout d'un moment, la silhouette se dessine plus nettement. Vous reconnaissez alors Idira, qui claque des doigts devant votre visage en riant à gorge déployée.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Vous m'entendez ? Vous en avez vu de toutes les couleurs, hein ? Pas de panique, ça va passer. Comment vous vous sentez ? Vous êtes toujours parmi nous ? »
languages.original_text: {n}After a while, the blob rearranges itself into the shape of Idira. She is snapping her fingers in front of your face and howling with laughter.{/n} "Lord Captain! Lord Captain, can you hear me? That was some ride, huh? You just take it easy, it'll pass soon. How are you feeling? Still among the living?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Au bout d'un moment, la silhouette se dessine plus nettement. Vous reconnaissez alors Idira, qui claque des doigts devant votre visage en riant à gorge déployée.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Vous m'entendez ? Vous en avez vu de toutes les couleurs, hein ? Pas de panique, ça va passer. Comment vous vous sentez ? Vous êtes toujours parmi nous ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tras un rato, la masa toma la forma de Idira. Está chascando los dedos delante de tu cara mientras se ríe a carcajadas.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán! Lord Capitán, ¿me oye? Menudo viaje, ¿eh? Relájese, se le pasará rápido. ¿Cómo se encuentra? ¿Sigue entre nosotros?».
languages.original_text: {n}After a while, the blob rearranges itself into the shape of Idira. She is snapping her fingers in front of your face and howling with laughter.{/n} "Lord Captain! Lord Captain, can you hear me? That was some ride, huh? You just take it easy, it'll pass soon. How are you feeling? Still among the living?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras un rato, la masa toma la forma de Idira. Está chascando los dedos delante de tu cara mientras se ríe a carcajadas.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán! Lord Capitán, ¿me oye? Menudo viaje, ¿eh? Relájese, se le pasará rápido. ¿Cómo se encuentra? ¿Sigue entre nosotros?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}过了一会儿，眼前的斑点开始变形，重新变成了伊迪拉的样子。她对你打着响指，放声大笑。{/n}“舰长大人！舰长大人！能听到我说话吗？这趟旅途还不赖吧？别紧张，这股劲儿很快就会过去。你感觉怎么样？感觉自己还活着吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}After a while, the blob rearranges itself into the shape of Idira. She is snapping her fingers in front of your face and howling with laughter.{/n} "Lord Captain! Lord Captain, can you hear me? That was some ride, huh? You just take it easy, it'll pass soon. How are you feeling? Still among the living?"

traits.locale_text: {n}过了一会儿，眼前的斑点开始变形，重新变成了伊迪拉的样子。她对你打着响指，放声大笑。{/n}“舰长大人！舰长大人！能听到我说话吗？这趟旅途还不赖吧？别紧张，这股劲儿很快就会过去。你感觉怎么样？感觉自己还活着吗？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}しばらくすると、塊はイディラの形になった。彼女はあなたの顔の前で指を鳴らし、吠えるように笑っている。{/n} 「ロード・キャプテン！ロード・キャプテン！聞こえますか？今のは乗り心地が悪かったでしょう？無理しないでください。すぐに治ります。気分はどうですか？生きてますか？」
languages.original_text: {n}After a while, the blob rearranges itself into the shape of Idira. She is snapping her fingers in front of your face and howling with laughter.{/n} "Lord Captain! Lord Captain, can you hear me? That was some ride, huh? You just take it easy, it'll pass soon. How are you feeling? Still among the living?"

traits.locale_text: {n}しばらくすると、塊はイディラの形になった。彼女はあなたの顔の前で指を鳴らし、吠えるように笑っている。{/n} 「ロード・キャプテン！ロード・キャプテン！聞こえますか？今のは乗り心地が悪かったでしょう？無理しないでください。すぐに治ります。気分はどうですか？生きてますか？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nach einer Weile arrangiert sich der Blob neu und nimmt die Gestalt von Idira an. Sie schnippt vor deinem Gesicht mit den Fingern und heult vor Lachen.{/n} "Lord Captain! Lord Captain, hört Ihr mich? Das war vielleicht was, hm? Entspannt Euch einfach, es geht bald vorbei. Wie geht es Euch? Weilt Ihr noch unter den Lebenden?"
languages.original_text: {n}After a while, the blob rearranges itself into the shape of Idira. She is snapping her fingers in front of your face and howling with laughter.{/n} "Lord Captain! Lord Captain, can you hear me? That was some ride, huh? You just take it easy, it'll pass soon. How are you feeling? Still among the living?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer Weile arrangiert sich der Blob neu und nimmt die Gestalt von Idira an. Sie schnippt vor deinem Gesicht mit den Fingern und heult vor Lachen.{/n} "Lord Captain! Lord Captain, hört Ihr mich? Das war vielleicht was, hm? Entspannt Euch einfach, es geht bald vorbei. Wie geht es Euch? Weilt Ihr noch unter den Lebenden?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bir süre sonra kütle, şekil alıp İdira'ya dönüşüyor. Yüzünün önünde parmaklarını şıklatıyor ve katıla katıla gülüyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan! Lord Kaptan, beni duyabiliyor musun? Acayip bir kafa, değil mi? Rahatla, yakında geçecek. Nasıl hissediyorsun? Hâlâ biz fânilerle misin?"
languages.original_text: {n}After a while, the blob rearranges itself into the shape of Idira. She is snapping her fingers in front of your face and howling with laughter.{/n} "Lord Captain! Lord Captain, can you hear me? That was some ride, huh? You just take it easy, it'll pass soon. How are you feeling? Still among the living?"
